column1: '''''Poems and Stories''''' is a book first published in 1980. It reprints several works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'', "[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth, Beorhthelm's Son]]", ''[[On Fairy-Stories]]'', ''[[Leaf by Niggle]]'', ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'', and ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]''.
